text.description:
{Wasp Stinger}

This right-handed weapon increases your Attack skill by +4 and grants all units in your army a 7% chance to cast Poison on enemies after attacking.
text.event: You grasp the Wasp Stinger, its long, sleek, venom-tipped edge pulsing faintly with a deadly energy. The artifact hums in your hand, a reminder of wasp's wrath and the power now at your command.
text.name: Wasp Stinger
